Meaning: the shadow a few steps away

Pinyin: tā nòng tòng wǒmen de yǎnjing

Meaning:
to talk to oneself
to think aloud

every act and every move
every action

in order to avoid
so as not to
lest

to move backward and forward
to swing

to send out
to send forth
to emit
distribute

to hide from view
to screen
to obstruct
